first_translate: what is lord  arendt doing here?!

hangle: 귀족이 아닌 아가씨가 마리안 의상실을 이용하신다고요?
first_translate: an ordinary young woman like yourself uses marian tailoring services?

hangle: 제가 마리안 의상실에 다녀온 걸 어떻게 아셨죠?
first_translate: how did you know I went there?
because I just saw you come out from there.
my apologies if that was rude of me.

hangle: …그리고 의상실은 아는 사람 때문에 들어간 것뿐이에요.
first_translate: and I only visited because someone introduced me to them.
then let us call each other by our names then.

hangle: 가라고 하고 싶은데, 귀족이 아니라고 한 주제에
first_translate: I want to tell him to leave, but he's a marquess! how can I chase away such a high-ranking nobleman when I'm no longer one myself?!
I want to tell him to leave, but he's a marquess! how can I chase away such a high-ranking nobleman when I'm no longer one myself?!
do you have business with me or something?

hangle: 혹시 수도에서 정식 마법사로 활동하는 게 아니라면…
first_translate: if you don’t plan on working as a proper magician in this city,
I’d like to make you a proposal.

hangle: 아렌트는 내 마법적인 재능에 관심을 가진 게 틀림없다.
first_translate: he must’ve taken interest in my magical abilities.
this happened in the original story too.

hangle: 말씀은 감사하지만 전 마법사로 활동할 생각이 없어서요.
first_translate: thank you for your offer, but I do not wish to work as a magician.

hangle: 혹시 따로 원하는 조건이 있다면 들어드리죠.
first_translate: is there anything else you desire?
go ahead and say what’s on your mind.

hangle: 저에게 오시면 마르지 않는 명예를 약속드릴 수…
first_translate: come under my wing, and I promise you endless glory--
doesn’t look like she knows who you really are yet, marquess clovis.
doesn’t look like she knows who you really are yet, marquess clovis.
I didn’t realize you were back in the capital.
you’re lord arendt clovis, aren’t you?
wait, why all of a sudden?!
to show her the dragon we caught.
since you haven’t seen any dragons before, right?

hangle: 무슨, 치킨 사 왔다는 투로 저런 말을 하네-!!
first_translate: look at his smug face!!! does he think catching a dragon is nothing special?!

hangle: 그놈이 어찌나 서두르는지, 죽는 줄 알았다.
first_translate: the way he rushed after it made me worry about whether he would die trying.

hangle: 클로비스 후작은 얘한테 무슨 볼일인지 모르겠군.
first_translate: I wonder what brings you to see ms. celine.

hangle: 셀린 양과는 아주 중요한 이야기를 하는 중이었습니다.
first_translate: I was having a very important conversation with her.

hangle: 그런가… 하지만 그 이야기는 나중으로 미뤄야겠군.
first_translate: alright... well, whatever it may be, it’ll have to wait till later.
unfortunately, I doubt that will be possible.

hangle: 전 아직 셀린 양에게 마저 할 말이 남아 있거든요.
first_translate: I still need to finish speaking with ms. celine first.

hangle: 실례지만 셀린 양과 공작님이 무슨 사이인지 물어도 괜찮을까요.
first_translate: pardon me, but might I ask what relationship you share with ms. celine?
that means, “if you don’t care, go away!”
what are you going to do now, your grace?!

hangle: 전 상사와 부하라고 하면 공작님이 밀린다고요!
first_translate: even if I told you we were boss and subordinate, you wouldn’t stand down!
when did you ever have a daughter?

hangle: 셀린 양은 처음 듣는 이야기란 표정인데요.
first_translate: but ms. celine looks confused herself.
of course, since she found out just now.

hangle: 그러니 부녀간의 오붓한 시간을 위해 빨리 가주면 좋겠군,
first_translate: now, please excuse yourselves so father and daughter can spend some quality time together,
I quit my job, not took a vacation.
next time, ignore those pesky flies buzzing around you.
it could've been fun had siegern been here.
by chance, are you referring to lord clovis?
what in the world is that?!
there isn’t enough time for this!

hangle: 괜찮아, 네가 생각하는 그런 게 아니니까.
first_translate: it’s alright. it’s not what you think it is.

hangle: 저건 사람들을 괴롭히기 위해 온 마물이 아니라―
first_translate: that creature hasn’t come to harm anyone.
